item.title: Java Security Notes
item.description: Java Security well-behaved: programs should be prevent from consuming too much system resources Components JCE: Java Cryptography Extension JSSE: Java Secure Socketets Extension JAAS: Java Authentication and Authorization Service Anatomy of a Java Application the bytecode verifier The bytecode verifier ensures that Java class files follow the rules of the Java language. As the figure implies, not all classes are subject to bytecode verification. the class loader One or more class loaders load all Java classes.
